original_title: Big Head Todd and the Monsters - Live at the Fillmore
overview: The bluesy pop of Colorado-based trio Big Head Todd and The Monsters is on display in this superb live performance from San Francisco's legendary Fillmore Auditorium. Join frontman Todd Park Mohr (whose cranium is actually normal-sized) and company for energetic renditions of "Secret Mission," "Bittersweet," "Come On," "Circle," "Imaginary Ships," and more.
title: Big Head Todd and the Monsters - Live at the Fillmore
